mapper.insert: insert into note (not_snum, not_getmem_snum, not_postmem_snum, not_subject, not_context, not_regdate, not_post_sent) values(seq_not_snum.nextval,(select mem_snum from member where mem_id= #{not_getmem_id}), #{not_postmem_snum}, #{not_subject}, #{not_context}, sysdate, 1)
mapper.select: select n.not_snum, m.mem_name not_postmem_name, n.not_subject, m.mem_id not_postmem_id, m.mem_profile not_postmem_profile, n.not_regdate from note n, member m where n.not_postmem_snum = m.mem_snum and not_isread = 0 and not_getmem_snum = #{not_getmem_snum} and n.not_getmem_deleted = 0

select not_snum, m.mem_id not_postmem_id, m.mem_name not_postmem_name, not_subject, not_context, not_isread, not_regdate, not_getmem_snum, not_postmem_snum, gm.mem_id not_getmem_id from member m ,note n, member gm where n.NOT_SNUM = #{not_snum} and n.not_postmem_snum = m.MEM_SNUM and gm.mem_snum =not_getmem_snum
select nvl(count(1),0) not_readmessage_count from member m, note n where n.not_isread = 0 and m.mem_id = #{auth_id } and m.mem_snum = n.not_getmem_snum and n.not_getmem_deleted = 0

select * from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(note pk_not_snum)*/ rownum rm, n.not_snum, m.mem_id not_postmem_id, m.mem_name not_postmem_name, n.not_subject, n.not_isread, n.not_regdate, n.not_readdate from member m , note n where m.mem_snum = n.not_postmem_snum and n.not_getmem_deleted != 1 and n.not_getmem_snum = #{snum} and rownum <= #{page}*#{perPageNum}) where rm > (#{page}-1) * #{perPageNum} order by not_regdate desc
